Kann man machen muss man aber nicht

Despite the fact that this game is enjoyable, competing with players who have been playing for a long time is really difficult. Also, even when I'm not playing with my friend who is much higher and better than me, I've met a lot of folks who smurf. The game's skill-based matchmaking makes no sense, since I frequently find myself competing against players that are far better than me. I'd want to play this game, but there's too much to learn and not enough time to learn it. People often mock me for being awful, but how can you improve when everyone is smurfing? Please don't misunderstand what I'm saying. I'm not trying to imply that the CS player base is poor. There were many people who tried to aid you develop, but the smurfing occurred much too frequently. People who disagree with this are either SC fanatics who will turn a blind eye and ignore you, or they themselves smurf. Still a great game, but you'll need to put in a lot of work to master it.
